document_data.name: ''Sunreacher''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Sunreacher''''' was one of the four elven ''[[wardragon]]s'' in [[Evermeet]]'s navy.The ''wardragon'' ship type is described as being magically propelled with no sails, though the ''Sunreacher'' is drawn in ''[[Elves of Evermeet]]'' on the map of Ruith as having a sail.
document_data.History: The ''Sunreacher'' spent some time in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]] anchored at the habor of [[Ruith]].
